info.name: Infakt - API Documentation
info.description:
API inFakt

Zmienne:
- url
- api_key
- basic_auth_username
- basic_auth_password

body.raw:
{
    "corrective_invoice": {
        "payment_method": "other",
        "client_id": {{client_id}},
        "corrected_invoice_number": "{{invoice_id}}",
        "correction_reason": "other",
        "services": [
            {
                "name": "Przykładowa Usługa",
                "unit_net_price": 6623,
                "group": "1",
                "quantity": "1.0",
                "correction": false,
                "tax_symbol": "23",
                "pkwiu": "84.11.12.0"
            },
            {
                "name": "Przykładowa Usługa - korekta",
                "unit_net_price": 6600,
                "group": "1",
                "quantity": "1.0",
                "correction": true,
                "tax_symbol": "23",
                "pkwiu": "84.11.12.0"
            },
            {
                "name": "Przykładowy produkt",
                "unit_net_price": 6623,
                "group": "2",
                "quantity": "1.0",
                "correction": false,
                "tax_symbol": "23",
                "pkwiu": "46.11.12"
            },
            {
                "name": "Przykładowy produkt - korekta",
                "unit_net_price": 6623,
                "group": "2",
                "quantity": "0",
                "correction": true,
                "tax_symbol": "23",
                "pkwiu": "46.11.12"
            }
        ]
    }
}

item.name: Set as sign corrective invoice - deprecated

body.raw:
{"oss_invoice": {
          "country": "AT",
          "number": "{{$randomAlphaNumeric}}",
          "check_duplicate_number": false,
          "client_email": "{{email}}",

          "currency": "EUR",
          "service_place_primary": "185 Jaqueline Inlet",
          "service_place_secondary": "Labadie, Bergstrom and Bahringer",
          "recipient_signature": "multi-byte auxiliary facilitate Chair solid",
          "seller_signature": "seller_signature",

               {

}
